PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DrainageCulvert
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Covered channel or large pipe that forms a watercourse below ground level, usually under a road or railway (BS6100). Used as a non type driven property set in conjunction with an instance of IfcSystem that is classified as a culvert.

PropertyDef.Name: InternalWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The internal width of the culvert

PropertyDef.Name: ClearDepth
PropertyDef.Definition: The clear depth of the culvert
